name: Nischith B O
title: QA Automation | DevOps | 4+  Years Experience
summary:
With 4+ years of expertise in Software Development in Test (SDET) and DevOps, I specialize in test automation, cloud infrastructure, and CI/CD pipelines. Currently pursuing my Master’s at the University of Florida, I’m passionate about optimizing software delivery, enhancing system reliability, and driving automation at scale.
Skilled in Java, Python, cloud platforms, and infrastructure as code, I thrive on building efficient, automated, and high-performing systems. Open to SDET & DevOps opportunities where I can make an impact!
